name: Global IntelliSystems
overview:
The swiss-army-knife of email marketing services. Designed for high volume marketers or any marketer with the desire for higher inbox deliveries due to dedicated servers (plural), 24x7 mailbox monitoring, confirmed opt-in conversion assistance, database marketing, click/open/bounce/forward tracking, and a variety of other must-have tools.

Competitors may have shiny spinning buttons and websites that are dripping with rich colors and video, but Global has clients who are reaching the inbox more than on any other service in the USA. If performance and results is what you are seeking in email marketing, look no further than Global.
